title: Everton 2-0 Fulham, West Ham 3-2 Burnley, and more: football clockwatch – live
summary: Barry Glendenning will provide live updates starting at 3pm GMT on Premier League matches and other events. Tune in for the latest developments and scores. Stay informed on all the action!

title: Sunderland v Arsenal: Premier League – live
summary: Mikel Arteta's team, currently at the top of the league, is set to play at the Stadium of Light. Scott Murray will provide minute-by-minute updates on the match. Fans can follow along for the latest developments.

summary: Lee Calvert provides real-time updates as the All Blacks prepare to face off at Murrayfield. Fans can follow along for live commentary and insights throughout the match. The atmosphere is charged as both teams gear up for this exciting encounter.

title: WTA Finals tennis: Aryna Sabalenka v Elena Rybakina in the final – live
summary: Taha Hashim is hosting updates on the season-ending tournament taking place in Riyadh. The event marks the conclusion of the competitive season. Stay tuned for the latest highlights and results.

title: Premier League top scorers 2025-26: who is leading race for golden boot?
summary: This season's English Premier League features a competitive race for the top goalscorer title, showcasing several standout players. Fans can track the current leaders as they vie for dominance in the league's goalscoring charts. The excitement builds as each match influences the rankings.
